title: Media Stops, Consistent Issue
content:
This is a weird one. Whenever I start playing media on my phone, typically podcasts, the media will just pause after about 4 to 5 minutes. Once I restart it it plays fine and doesn't stop again. This only happens the first time I start an app during a session of listening/watching. For example:

-Start podcast on Doggcatcher, stops at about 4 minutes, plays fine after
-Switch to pandora, stops at about 4 minutes, plays fine after,
-Repeat ad nauseum

My phone is up to date and the apps are up to date. Is this some sort of setting issue? Do I need to do a factory reset to resolve this?
